org.restlet.ext.oauth.internal

インタフェース TokenManager

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AbstractTokenManager, SQLiteTokenManager

    public interface TokenManager

    • メソッドの詳細

      • generateToken

        Token generateToken(Client client,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    Scope[] scope,
                    java.lang.String applicationName)
             throws OAuthException
        Generate a new token for the client and the username. If the token has already issued for the client and the username, the token will be replaced or updated. If username is null, token will issued for the client itself.
        パラメータ:
        client -
        username -
        scope -
        applicationName - アプリケーション名(追加)
        戻り値:
        例外:
        OAuthException

      • generateToken

        Token generateToken(Client client,
                    Scope[] scope,
                    java.lang.String applicationName)
             throws OAuthException
        Call #generateToken(org.restlet.ext.oauth.internal.Client, java.lang.String, java.lang.String[], java.lang.String) with username=null.
        パラメータ:
        client -
        scope -
        戻り値:
        例外:
        OAuthException

      • storeSession

        java.lang.String storeSession(AuthSession session)
                       throws OAuthException
        例外:
        OAuthException

      • restoreSession

        AuthSession restoreSession(java.lang.String code)
                    throws OAuthException
        例外:
        OAuthException

      • findToken

        Token findToken(Client client,
                java.lang.String username)
        Find a token issued for the client and the username. For those tokens issued for 'client_credentials' grant type, username must be null.
        パラメータ:
        client - the client that bound to token.
        username - the username that bound to token. null if the token was issued for the client itself.
        戻り値:
        null if not found.

      • findToken

        Token findToken(Client client)
        Call findToken(org.restlet.ext.oauth.internal.Client, java.lang.String) with username=null.
        パラメータ:
        client - the client that bound to token.
        戻り値:
        null if not found.

      • findTokens

        Token[] findTokens(java.lang.String username)
        Find all tokens bound to the username.
        パラメータ:
        username - the username that bound to tokens.
        戻り値:
        0 length if not found.

      • findTokens

        Token[] findTokens(Client client)
        Find all tokens bound to the client.
        パラメータ:
        client - the client that bound to tokens.
        戻り値:
        0 length if not found.

      • revokeToken

        void revokeToken(Client client,
                 java.lang.String username)
        Revoke a token issued for the client and the username. For those tokens issued for 'client_credentials' grant type, username must be null.
        パラメータ:
        client - the client that bound to token.
        username - the username that bound to token. null if the token was issued for the client itself.

      • findTokenByAccessToken

        Token findTokenByAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken)
        アクセストークンが一致するトークンを探す.
        パラメータ:
        accessToken - アクセストークン
        戻り値:
        not null: アクセストークンが一致するトークンデータ / null: アクセストークンが一致するトークンデータが見つからない

      • revokeToken

        void revokeToken(Client client)
        Call revokeToken(org.restlet.ext.oauth.internal.Client, java.lang.String) with username=null.
        パラメータ:
        client - the client that bound to token.

      • revokeAllTokens

        void revokeAllTokens(java.lang.String username)
        Revoke all tokens bound to the username.
        パラメータ:
        username - the username that bound to tokens.

      • revokeAllTokens

        void revokeAllTokens(Client client)
        Revoke all tokens bound to the client.
        パラメータ:
        client - the client that bound to tokens.
